questions.question: Why did European powers come to India?
questions.answer: For trade

questions.question: Which European country was the first to reach India by sea?
questions.answer: Portugal

questions.question: Who discovered the sea route to India in 1498?
questions.answer: Vasco da Gama

questions.question: Which commodity mainly attracted Europeans to India?
questions.answer: All of these

questions.question: Which European trading company became most powerful in India?
questions.answer: British East India Company

questions.question: Where did the British establish their first factory in India?
questions.answer: Surat

questions.question: Which battle marked the beginning of British political power in India?
questions.answer: Battle of Plassey

questions.question: Which European power was defeated in the Battle of Wandiwash?
questions.answer: French

questions.question: Which system helped Europeans control Indian trade?
questions.answer: Factory system

questions.question: What was the result of European rivalry in India?
questions.answer: Political control by British

questions.question: Why did Europeans come to India?
questions.answer: Europeans came to India mainly for trade in spices, cotton and other valuable goods.

questions.question: Who was Vasco da Gama?
questions.answer: Vasco da Gama was a Portuguese explorer who discovered the sea route to India in 1498.

questions.question: Name the major European trading companies in India.
questions.answer: Portuguese, Dutch, French and British East India Companies were major trading companies.

questions.question: Why did the British East India Company become powerful?
questions.answer: Because of strong trade network, military power and political strategies.

questions.question: What was the importance of the Battle of Plassey?
questions.answer: It marked the beginning of British political rule in India.
